revised_title: Early Development Stages of Antedon Rosacea
tldr: This article investigates the early development stages of Antedon rosacea, an echinoderm, and provides detailed descriptions of its larval development, including its external form, segmentation, and organ formation. The study contributes to the understanding of echinoderm development and sheds light on the process of cohesion and adhesion in these organisms.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Developmental Biology
